name: WafflesRoyale PRESENTS: BOOMROOM
description:
Made as part of week one for FIREPIT | Game-A-Week #1.

WafflesRoyale PRESENTS: BOOMROOM.

A simple game with one simple task.

Escape the room  in TEN SECONDS.

The price of failure is shall we say EXPLOSIVE.
